author: BVM Sportsdesk
title: Lori Taylor Welcomes Veteran Coach Andre Moore to Richmond Track & Field - BVM Sports
text:
Lori Taylor Welcomes Veteran Coach Andre Moore to Richmond Track & Field
Andre Moore has been reappointed as an assistant coach for the University of Richmond's track and field staff. His return in November 2025 aims to bolster the program's tradition of success, driven by his extensive coaching experience and commitment to student-athlete development. Having previously served from 2010 to 2018, Moore was integral in coaching a variety of track and field disciplines and fostering numerous All-American athletes. His coaching philosophy emphasizes personal discipline and a balance between academics and athletics, building on his vast background in both athletic coaching and community service.
- Two NCAA Division I All-Americans coached during his first tenure (Andrew Benford, Nicol Traynor).
- 30 Atlantic 10 All-Conference performers developed during his previous time with the Spiders across various events.
- Moore brings a blend of technical expertise and a holistic coaching style focused on athlete development.
- His leadership roles historically extend beyond track and field, including experience in cross country and football coaching.
- Moore has a notable background in community service and public safety, reinforcing his mentoring approach.
Moore's return is expected to enhance the performance and recruitment strategies of the track and field team. His comprehensive coaching style may lead to improved athlete results and expanded opportunities for current and future students. Anticipated growth in team cohesion and discipline under his guidance could significantly impact the Spiders' competitive outlook in upcoming seasons.
Bottom LineMooreâ€™s reappointment stands as a significant step towards reinforcing the University of Richmond's tradition of athletic excellence. His diverse experience and commitment to developing well-rounded student-athletes position him as a valuable asset for the team's future success and a catalyst for maintaining competitive performance in track and field.
Read more at University of Richmond Athletics
